review.title: “Excellent employer for 16 years.”
review.pros: Pros – Hard working company, committed to putting out a thorough product, with fairness and validity, backed by research. Works both Plaintiff and Defense cases equally. Treats employees like family. Liberal time off, as needed, with pay.
review.cons: Cons – Small company with limited upward mobility. Better pay, but you do the same job.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Nothing I haven't shared.
